title: Implement Combining Accents (dead keys) for physicial keyboards.
message:
Implement Combining Accents (dead keys) for physicial keyboards.

Also known as "Dead Keys".

Example:

In preferences set "Default to UTF-8".
Attach a hardware bluetooth keyboard.
Type Right-Alt-`
At this point you'll see a ` character in the cursor.
Type e
At this point you will see è appear. (If not, check that the
Default to UTF-8 preference is set correctly.)

Hat tip to the ConnectBot TermKeyListener.java source code.

title: Merge pull request #32 from rtfb/master
message:
Merge pull request #32 from rtfb/master

Fix build break + fix most of Lint warnings

title: Fix up ActionBar action buttons
message:
Fix up ActionBar action buttons

Lint insists that showAsAction=always is bad idea, and it seems
reasonable. So I changed it to ifRoom and reordered to maintain the old
behavior. The only difference on 10" emulator is that there's no room
for Save button, which seems acceptable.

title: Bump target SDK version
message:
Bump target SDK version

Update your installed SDK version:
$ <sdk>/tools/android update sdk --no-ui --filter android-17

title: Add grayscale images for notification
message:
Add grayscale images for notification

Lint insists that notifications should not use colors.

title: Make message handlers static inner classes
message:
Make message handlers static inner classes

Lint suggested this could avoid leaked objects in certain cases.

If the handler class is not static, it will have a reference to the
outer object (usually Activity), and the messages will have a reference
to a target handler. So in a rare case of message getting stalled in the
queue for a long time, GC will be unable to collect the heavy-weight
objects.

Explanation and solutions here:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11407943/this-handler-class-should-be-static-or-leaks-might-occur-incominghandler
http://groups.google.com/group/android-developers/msg/959f98f16a038694?pli=1

title: Remove excessive LinearLayout
message: Remove excessive LinearLayout

title: Explicitly declare allowBackup=true
message:
Explicitly declare allowBackup=true

Lint suggests to do that, and the default is true.

title: Move uses-sdk element to beginning of manifest
message:
Move uses-sdk element to beginning of manifest

Lint suggests to do that. The rationale seems to be some hard to track
bugs that can be caused by late inclusion of this element.

Merge pull request #27 from rtfb/master

Automatically generate JNI function signatures

title: Cleanup: remove unused imports
message: Cleanup: remove unused imports

title: Automatically generate signatures for JNI functions
message:
Automatically generate signatures for JNI functions

Before building native code, call javap to get the signatures of the
functions declared as native in Java code. This allows us having the
simplest possible declaration of native functions.

Unfortunately, that involves a little bit of awk magic. The first call
to awk filters out the pairs of lines for each native function
declaration. The second one transforms those lines into a C variable
declaration, of the form

    char const* jni_signature_functionName =
        "<the JNI signarure>";

title: Call native build from ant debug target
message:
Call native build from ant debug target

Turns out it's quite easy to hook into ant build process, so let's do
it.

message:
Merge pull request #19 from rtfb/master

Slightly improve performance of installZip()

title: Improve unzip performance by ~15%
message:
Improve unzip performance by ~15%

The main gain is from increase of the buffer. Using BufferedInputStream
also seems to have a little positive effect. It's OK to remove
zin.closeEntry(), since zin.getNextEntry() will call that anyway.

Log progress as info, not as error.

title: refine touch event handling by split moveCursor and mouseUp
message:
refine touch event handling by split moveCursor and mouseUp
    1. originally, vimtouch will send mouse down and up event for every
    move. The patch changes it to send mouse down only when touch down
    and send mouse up only when touch up.
    2. in zoom mode, still send mouse down and up
    3. adjust fling frequence to improve ux.

title: Fix 'Copy All' functionality
message:
Fix 'Copy All' functionality

Copy All used to do a silly thing: copy the array of characters
currently visible in terminal. Including the Vim's '~' lines and such.
Instead, this should copy the contents of the whole buffer, which this
implementation does. Works even with folding enabled :-)

title: move scrollBy, updateScreen, setCol, lineReplace to vim thread(fake gpm)
message:
move scrollBy, updateScreen, setCol, lineReplace to vim thread(fake gpm)
    These functions become events in the fake gpm GetEvent. Besides,
    still keep use vimtouch_lock/unlock between setPtySize and
    updateScreen to avoid updateScreen too early.

title: Fixed showDialog can't be triggered by doCommand
message:
Fixed showDialog can't be triggered by doCommand
        showDialog and doCommand should be invoked by different thread
        (ex: vim thread and android ui thread). In most of case, the
        showDialog was invoked by vim thread and trigger realShowDialog
        later. If someone calls doCommand("new xxx.txt") and cause
        dialog happens, dead lock happened here.
        This patch move the real do_cmdline_cmd always to vim thread by
        using the Fake GPM check event system.

title: Get rid of setjmp/longjmp hack, yay!
message:
Get rid of setjmp/longjmp hack, yay!

As expected, it didn't take long for setjmp/longjmp pair to cause us
problems. After a trivial change in 9694c851c76b9764 the app crashes
again on exit due to longjmp() crossing thread-boundary.

This changes the hack with a call back to Java side, which then
initiates exit of Activity.

title: Fix notification crash
message:
Fix notification crash

1. The contentIntent parameter is required.
2. Don't use DEFAULT_ALL, which includes vibration, which requires
   permission and annoys people, being completely unnecessary.
3. Set autocancel flag to automatically remove notification from status
   bar when it's clicked.

title: add mutex in termExec
message: add mutex in termExec

title: Fix memory leak in error handling path
message:
Fix memory leak in error handling path

In thread_wrapper(), when error handling code path is hit, the memory
allocated for the argvs is leaked. Fix that by moving memory management
into the same thread that allocated it. To accommodate possible future
use of Exec.waitFor() with other threads, tie the data to thread id.

title: Fix Exec.waitFor() to return thread exit code
message: Fix Exec.waitFor() to return thread exit code

title: Cosmetics: rename variable to C style
message: Cosmetics: rename variable to C style

title: Fix wrapper for pthread_exit()
message:
Fix wrapper for pthread_exit()

Rename the wrapper to pth_exit() to hightlight the fact that it's a thin
wrapper for thread exit and not system's exit(). Also, actually return
the exit status.

title: Don't quit when closing file descriptor
message:
Don't quit when closing file descriptor

The native implementation of Exec.close() should only close the FD and
not call for process termination.

title: Do not hold reference to activity in TermSession
message:
Do not hold reference to activity in TermSession

Use callback instead.

title: Fix bug with keyboard staying on screen after :q
message:
Fix bug with keyboard staying on screen after :q

Vim code calls exit() when it quits and that immediately drags the whole
app's process with it. Instead of calling mch_exit(), longjmp() to the
place of call to AndroidMain() and quit gracefully.

With that in place, Java side is now able to clean up before closing.
